title: Patch 7.15 Install issue on Mac
body: Hey all anyone else having issues installing 7.15 on Mac OS 10.12.5? I started the install over an hour ago and am still sitting at 0% holding my cursor over the percent bar shows that lol client is scanning every file after an hour I'm at only 8000 files scanned.

replies.body:
As long as the patcher keeps scanning files you should be alright. Once it finishes scanning it will then start to download and apply the latest patch. 

If you notice that it stops at a certain file and never moves forward, you might need to adjust some of your settings to make sure your OS is allowing the patcher to do it's thing. Check out these steps on how to [**adjust your admin settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) and let me know if you can get back on the Rift.
